original_title: The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriter Nia Vardalos
overview: NIA VARDALOS was nominated for the Academy AwardÂ® and the Writers Guild Award in 2003 for her breakthrough screenplay My Big Fat Greek Wedding, which was based on her one-woman play. The film became the highest-grossing independent feature and turned her in to an overnight success, spawning a follow-up sitcom and a cemented spot among Hollywood s elite writers. Listen as she talks candidly about her favorite laugh, tapping into her inner guy, and why her take on the hardest part of screenwriting just might make you blush.
tagline: An interview series that gives unprecedented looks into the lives of working screenwriters.
title: The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriter Nia Vardalos
